entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this morning. 30 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets changing to 70 percent chance of snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
